name: activist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who believes strongly in political or social change and takes part in activities such as public protests to try to make this happen: He's been a trade union/party activist for many years. an animal rights activist
More examplesFewer examplesHuman rights activists have accused the country's government of a systematic perpetration of violence against minority groups.Local activist groups have become increasingly vociferous as the volume of traffic passing through the village has grown.a martyred civil rights activista green activist
